cleaned_text: At Clayton Chiropractic, we serve the greater Clayton area. We have worked hard to expand our services, making sure that we are able to help all of our patients with their healthcare needs. One of the ways that we do this is by providing chiropractic care to boost our patients' immune systems. When people think about chiropractors, they often envision medical professionals who specialize in helping people with neck and back pain. While this is central to the role of a chiropractor, there is also evidence that chiropractic care can actually boost someone's immune system as well. When people visit their chiropractor, they often report experiencing fewer infections. This is evidence that chiropractic care can help people boost their immune system, resulting in fewer infections. How does this happen? The goal of a chiropractic adjustment is to make sure the vertebrae in the back are aligned properly. This ensures that the nerves in the spinal cord are lined up properly as well. When people receive adjustments as part of their chiropractic care, interference with the body's nervous system is reduced, allowing the nerves to function at their highest level. Given that the nervous system controls all of the body's functions, including the immune system, adjustments will improve the ability of the nerves that power the immune system, leading to a boost. In this fashion, people who have chiropractic adjustments experience fewer infections because their immune system is working better. The nerves have been placed in a position to be successful, restoring a healthy resting nervous system. The result is happier, healthier patients. This is one of the biggest reasons why everyone should consider regular chiropractic care. At Clayton Chiropractic, we provide everyone in the greater Clayton area with access to a chiropractor to boost immune system.
